bibl.title: T.C. Skeat, P64+67and P4, and the Problem of Fibre Orientation in Codicological Reconstruction. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A short, modified version of the paper appeared in: Traianos Gagos (Editor), Adam Hyatt (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 131-140, 1 tabl., 3 figg. - The codicology of P67. - Fibre orientation limits possible codicological reconstruction. - Identification of P64+67 with P4. - A second problem: the fibre orientation of P4. - Codex construction and copying. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Charlesworth S.D., T.C. Skeat, P64+67and P4, and the Problem of Fibre Orientation in Codicological Reconstruction. Avec résumé en anglais.

A short, modified version of the paper appeared in: Traianos Gagos (Editor), Adam Hyatt (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 131-140, 1 tabl., 3 figg. - The codicology of P67. - Fibre orientation limits possible codicological reconstruction. - Identification of P64+67 with P4. - A second problem: the fibre orientation of P4. - Codex construction and copying. - Conclusion.
